vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for a Planned Development District for MF-2(A) Multifamily District uses on property zoned a CR Community Retail District, on the west corner of Mountain Creek Parkway and Sorcey Road
Recommendation of Staff: Approval, subject to a development plan and conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Denial
Z190-353(LG)
